configStructure.name: logDebug
configStructure.description: Outputs debug log from the parser / importer.

configStructure.name: iterations
configStructure.displayName: Number of iterations for layout algorithm.
configStructure.description: Iterations for running the cola layout algorithm.

configStructure.name: linkDistance
configStructure.displayName: Average distance for links in the graph.
configStructure.description: Smaller for smaller graphs, larger for larger graphs.

configStructure.name: nodeSize
configStructure.description: Used in the layout algorithm, shouldn't need to be changed.

configStructure.name: glmFile
configStructure.description: Gridlab-D GLM file containing the power system model to be loaded into WebGME.
